personalEfficiency.title: Efficiency
personalEfficiency.description: Increase chunk of work completion by click by 5%

personalMoneyPerTask.title: Money per task
personalMoneyPerTask.description: Increase money rewards per completed task by 20%

taskPairing.title: Pairing
taskPairing.description: Allows you to help on tasks already assigned to an assistant.

buyAssistants.title: New Assistant
buyAssistants.description: Hire a new assistant to help you complete tasks.

assistantsMultitasking.title: Multitasking
assistantsMultitasking.description: Assistants can take on more tasks at once.

assistantEfficiency.title: Efficiency
assistantEfficiency.description: Increase chunk of work completion rate by 5%.

buyBoss.title: Get a Boss
buyBoss.description: Hire a new boss to help you create and review tasks.

increaseDifficulty.title: Increase difficulty
increaseDifficulty.description: Increase difficulty of tasks by 1 and reward $ by 100%.

hasDeadline.title: Has deadline
hasDeadline.description: Doubles $ reward but tasks will expire after a while.

bossMultitasking.title: Multitasking
bossMultitasking.description: Boss can review more tasks at once.

bossInterval.title: Moar!
bossInterval.description: Increase Boss tasks generation speed by 5%.
